content.text:
# Draft:Happy Hacking Space

Happy Hacking Space (HHS) is a nonprofit network of hackers founded way before but announced in 2022 by Doğan Can Bakır, Omar Kurt, and many others. It serves as a community for hackers, crafters, and explorers across Mesopotamia. The network promotes open collaboration, peer learning, and experimental technology, workshops, and open-source projects. HHS opened its headquarters in Diyarbakır in 2025.
